text: Ezɨ Judas, gumazir Iesus isava apanibar agharim gatɨzim, a garima me paza Iesus gamuava a isa kotiam garɨgha ghaze, an aremegham. Ezɨ Judas gara ghaze, kɨ uabɨ arazir kuram gami. Egha uan nɨghnɨzibagh ira. Egha dagɨar silvan 30plan ofa gamir gumazir ekiaba ko Judabar gumazir aruaba a ganɨngiziba inigha ua me danɨngasa zui.
